description:
What a sweet smile on Damon! He melts my heart every time he grins at the camera, like a boy caught doing something naughty, but glad you caught him so he can show off some more.
Damon is a military kid in training. He's a very well-rounded kid liking athletics to staying home and reading. His first time jacking off was a very interesting location, and you will have to watch the video to find out where it was.
For a tall guy, he has an big 'ole bubble but, punctuated with a memorable birth mark. As Damon admits, ain't now way he can moon anyone without later being picked out in a line up.
Damon was fun and eager to show off, so I hope you will enjoy him.
title: Damon Hadlow - Solo
